1367911538955321344.text: The American Rescue Plan supports New Mexico’s hardest hit small businesses by providing an additional $7 billion for PPP loans and $15 billion for EIDL loans, and creating a $25 billion fund for restaurant owners.

1367911537902579719.text: For struggling New Mexico families, the relief package includes $1,400 direct payments and enhanced unemployment benefits. It also includes an expansion of the Child Tax Credit, which would lift 32,000 New Mexico children out of poverty and halve our state child poverty rate.
